Name: Infiniball
About the game: Infiniball is a simple yet addictive marble based game. See how long you can keep the ball on the infinitely expanding path without falling off the edge as your marble travels faster and faster! • Control a marble with the keyboard or a gamepad • Try to stay on the path • Infinite, randomly generated levels
